item.title: Recommendations for the next big migration
item.description: I learned some lessons during a recent PHP migration.

item.title: Simple Building with Composer.json
item.description: Load all server-side and client-side dependencies, libraries, and assets for a web application using Composer.

item.title: Girl Scout Way Badge Workshop and Newsletter
item.description: Scouts of all ranks completed traditional activities in a nontraditional way to earn the Girl Scout Way badge. Their written activities were used to create a newsletter called By The Way.
item.content:encoded:
Scouts of all ranks completed traditional activities in a nontraditional way to earn the Girl Scout Way badge. Their written activities were used to create a newsletter called By The Way.

See a PDF of the newsletter.

item.title: Democracy Badge Workshop and Newsletter
item.description: Daisies, Brownies, and Juniors spent two virtual workshops with me to earn the Democracy badge. Their written activities were used to create a newsletter called Daughters of Democracy.
item.content:encoded:
Daisies, Brownies, and Juniors spent two virtual workshops with me to earn the Democracy badge. Their written activities were used to create a newsletter called Daughters of Democracy.

See a PDF of the newsletter.

item.title: Scribe Badge Workshop and Newsletter
item.description: I led Juniors in my troop through 5 workshops to earn the Scribe badge. Their writing activities were used for a newsletter called Scribe's Scribbles.
item.content:encoded:
I led Juniors through 5 workshops to earn the Scribe badge. Their writing activities were used for a newsletter called Scribe's Scribbles.

See a PDF of the newsletter.

item.title: Comparison of Fever, 1793 and Contagion
item.description: The young adult novel Fever, 1793, and the thriller film Contagion use different narrative styles to share similar stories and themes about epidemics in order to attract and inform their audiences.

item.title: Building Academicjobs.u.e in Vue.js
item.description: Vue.js was a quick and successful option for this client-side-only web app.
